alert.note: Alert for Pierce (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 06 at 1:27AM CST until March 06 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...QUICK BURST OF HEAVY SNOW FOR EASTERN MINNESOTA AND PORTIONS OF WESTERN WISCONSIN THROUGH 4AM... .A Winter Storm Warning remains in effect through 4 AM from Carver and Wright counties in Minnesota, northeast to Polk county in Wisconsin and Kanabec county in Minnesota. This includes Carver, Hennepin, and Anoka counties in the Twin Cities metro area. A Winter Weather Advisory remains in effect for a row of counties on either side of the warning. Precipitation has transitioned to all snow, with snow expected the rest of the night. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches are expected tonight. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Wisconsin, Pierce County. In Minnesota, Washington County. * WHEN...Until 4 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
